pages.text: Rituals are a powerful magic practice used to have a direct effect on the world. They are cast by drawing circles and throwing in the proper ingredients.

Rituals need an $(l:bewitchment:introduction/altars)ME$()-providing $(l:bewitchment:introduction/altars)Altar$() nearby; the amount of $(l:bewitchment:introduction/altars)ME$() needed is always noted in the ritual's entry.$(br2)Every ritual has an inner and an optional outer circle drawn with different chalk, depending on the ritual.
A Golden Gylph always forms the center of a circle.
